title: Warcraft II: The Tides Of Darkness & Beyond The Dark Portal
description:
This one i've had quite a while, and now i decided to put it up for the rest of you to play :D

There's no cd-image, no installation. Just unrar and theres a pure game <3


The "Beyond the dark portal" Expansion is made so that you can choose both the original campaigns and the expansion campaigns through the menu. No cd change necessary.

The only bug i know is that the map scrolling is VERY fast even if the setup says slow. The only way i know around it is to use the map and click instead. But a very fast tap on the keyboard works to.


I've played this on both XP Home and Pro. It MAY even work on Vista, but i haven't tryed that yet.


SETUP.EXE (If you don't hear the music or voices of the characters you may have to change the drivers for the "Music" and "Digital" options. It worked great on my Windows XP)

WAR2.EXE and WAR2KALI.EXE (Starts the game. I don't know the difference on a modern computer for these two.)

WAR2ED95.EXE and WAR2EDIT.EXE (Starts the map/scenario editor. Same goes for this one.)

UVCONFIG.EXE (Video config. Don't mess around to much xD)



PS: Some homemade maps that my cousins made about 8-10 years ago comes as a plus for you guys xD

Have fun <3
